about: The system that allows you to put in or take out money from a bank account by using the internet.”
“A transfer of funds (as from one bank account to another) by electronic or formerly by telegraphic means” Examples: WISE, PAYPAL, WESTERN UNION
“A way of storing a user’s digital cash and online shopping information.” Examples: GPay, PayTM, PayPal, Apple Pay
“The act of sending, receiving, or managing money using a mobile phone.”
“A form or check indicating a credit against future purchases or expenditures” Examples:  gift vouchers, meal vouchers, travel vouchers, purchase vouchers
